```{r}
oflow <- c(13.2,26.09,21.34,9.4)
odepth <- c(1.25,.583,.542,1.67)
tdepth <- c(1.84,1.6,2.11)
tflow <- c(27.9,8.96,51.8)
flowq <- numeric(12)
depthq <- numeric(12)
i <- 1
for (t in 1:3) {
  for (o in 1:4) {
    flowq[i] <- tflow[t]/oflow[o]
    depthq[i] <- tdepth[t]/odepth[o]
    i <- i + 1
  }
}
flowq
depthq
k <- mean(oflow)/mean(tflow)
k
```
